page.title: 03SCOUTS
page.content: The local Cub-Scout group meetings are on Mondays, Wednesdays (6.30 to 8.00) and Fridays(7.30 to 9.30).On Monday Cubs meet, they play games, do things to get badges like swimmers,artists and entertainers.There are also three Arrow awards, bronze, silver and gold. Mrs. Botterill is the leader of the Monday pack, the cubs call her Akela. The Wednesday pack is run by Mrs. Standing. Friday is Scout night, they go on lots more camps than the cubs. This is why they have a longer law and promise. They have to learn this by heart.It is "On my honour I promise that I will do my best to do my duty to God and to the Queen, help other people and keep the scout law."
